{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=MMZ558 |revision=v1.0 |est_release_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf=Compex Systems |manuf_model=MMZ558 |manuf_rev=v1.0 (MMZ558HV 6A05AFCE 8128V523) |fcc_id=TK4XXX558 |availability=released |type=access point |pwr_v=24-56 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed=700 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Compex WLE900V5-23 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880;V2; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,MMCX |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |stock_os=CompexWRT |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|MiMo Zen series of Indoor Access Point}} :[http://www.compex.com.sg/product/mmz558/ Product Page] :[http://www.compex.com.sg/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/MMZ558-v3.1-WH-129-1.pdf Datasheet] :[http://www.compex.com.sg:809/DownLoads/Manual/CpxWRTman.pdf User Manual] ===Specifications=== * [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 @700MHz Networking Processor * 802.11ac compliant and backward compatible with 802.11abgn * Data rates of up to 1.3GBps in 802.11ac 80 MHz channels * Built-in 4dBi @2.4GHz & 5dBi @5GHz pyramidal omni smart antenna * Up to 26dBm output power ([[Compex WPJ558]]) === Ordering Configuration ===
